Class SandboxClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.aisandbox.sys.SandboxClient

  • public class SandboxClient
extends java.lang.Object
    Main class of the AI sandbox Java client. Call with arguments

    • Constructor Detail

      • SandboxClient

        public SandboxClient(java.lang.String h,
             int p,
             boolean v)
        Class constructor.
        Parameters:
        h - AI sandbox server hostname
        p - AI sandbox server port
        v - Whether or not to print exception stack traces and verbose output to console

    • Method Detail

      • connect

        public boolean connect(int timeout)
        Connect to server and send commander name.
        Parameters:
        timeout - Timeout in seconds to wait for server to show up (0 to wait forever)
        Returns:
        True if connection attempt succeeded, false otherwise

      • run

        public void run(boolean autoDisconnect)
        Run commander for bot simulation. Must call connect() before call to this method.

      • disconnect

        public void disconnect()
        Close connection to server.

      • msgFromServer

        public void msgFromServer(SandboxClient.ServerMsgType msg,
                 java.lang.String line1,
                 java.lang.String line2)
        Used internally, called when server sends a message to the commander.

      • getCmdName

        public java.lang.String getCmdName()
        Used internally to retreive custom commander name.
